import {useState} from 'react' import {useHistory} from 'react-router-dom' import '../Registration/index.css' const Login = () => { const [userName, setUserName] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const submitHandler = event => { event.preventDefault() useHistory.replace('/events-list/') } return (

Login

setUserName(event.target.value)} placeholder="USERNAME" className="input" id="username" type="text" /> setPassword(event.target.value)} placeholder="PASSWORD" className="input" id="password" type="password" />
) } export default Login
